health of you and your baby. Only 
one sampling of blood is needed 
to do all six tests. Before a blood 
sample is taken, you will be asked if 
you consent to the tests. You can 
decline to consent if you choose 
to. If a test is declined, it is standard 
practice	to	offer	it	again	later	in	your	
pregnancy.
Depending	on	any	identified	risks,	
further blood screening tests may 
be	offered,	such	as	Combined,	
Quadruple or Harmony tests.
